info.title: DnsResolverPolicyManagementClient
info.description: The DNS Resolver Policy Management Client.

put.description: Creates or updates a DNS resolver policy.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

200.description: The DNS resolver policy has been updated.

201.description: The DNS resolver policy has been created.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

200.description: The DNS resolver policy has been updated.

202.description: The operation to update DNS resolver policy has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a DNS resolver policy. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.

202.description: The operation to delete DNS resolver policy has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The DNS resolver policy was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets properties of a DNS resolver policy.

200.description: The DNS resolver policy was found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists DNS resolver policies within a resource group.

200.description: List of DNS resolver policies in the resource group.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists DNS resolver policies in all resource groups of a subscription.

200.description: List of DNS resolver policies in the subscription.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

put.description: Creates or updates a DNS security rule for a DNS resolver policy.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

200.description: The DNS security rule has been updated.

201.description: The DNS security rule has been created.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

200.description: The DNS security rule has been updated.

202.description: The operation to update the DNS security rule has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a DNS security rule for a DNS resolver policy. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.

202.description: The operation to delete the DNS security rule has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The DNS security rule was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets properties of a DNS security rule for a DNS resolver policy.

200.description: The DNS security rule was found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists DNS security rules for a DNS resolver policy.

200.description: List of DNS security rules for the DNS resolver policy.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

put.description: Creates or updates a DNS resolver policy virtual network link.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

200.description: The DNS resolver policy virtual network link has been updated.

201.description: The DNS resolver policy virtual network link has been created.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

parameters.name: parameters

200.description: The DNS resolver policy virtual network link has been updated.

202.description: The operation to update DNS resolver policy virtual network link has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

delete.description: Deletes a DNS resolver policy virtual network link. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.

202.description: The operation to delete the DNS resolver policy virtual network link has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The DNS resolver policy virtual network link was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets properties of a DNS resolver policy virtual network link.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists DNS resolver policy virtual network links.

put.description: Creates or updates a DNS resolver domain list.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

200.description: The DNS resolver domain list has been updated.

201.description: The DNS resolver domain list has been created.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

patch.description: Updates a DNS resolver domain list.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

200.description: The DNS resolver domain list has been updated.

202.description: The operation to update DNS resolver domain list has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a DNS resolver domain list. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.

202.description: The operation to delete DNS resolver domain list has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The DNS resolver domain list was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets properties of a DNS resolver domain list.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists DNS resolver domain lists within a resource group.

get.description: Lists DNS resolver domain lists in all resource groups of a subscription.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

post.description: Uploads or downloads the list of domains for a DNS Resolver Domain List from a storage link.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the bulk domain list operation.

200.description: The DNS resolver domain list bulk request was successful.

202.description: The operation to upload/download domains to the DNS Resolver Domain List has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

post.description: Lists DNS resolver policy resource IDs linked to a virtual network.

200.description: List of DNS resolver policy resource IDs linked to the virtual network.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

DnsResolverPolicyProperties.description: Represents the properties of a DNS resolver policy.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the DNS resolver policy. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

resourceGuid.description: The resourceGuid property of the DNS resolver policy resource.

etag.description: ETag of the DNS resolver policy.

properties.description: Properties of the DNS resolver policy.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

DnsResolverPolicyPatch.description: Describes a DNS resolver policy for PATCH operation.

DnsResolverPolicyListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on DNS resolver policies.

value.description: Enumeration of the DNS resolver policies.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

DnsSecurityRuleProperties.description: Represents the properties of a DNS security rule.

priority.description: The priority of the DNS security rule.

action.description: The action to take on DNS requests that match the DNS security rule.

dnsResolverDomainLists.description: DNS resolver policy domains lists that the DNS security rule applies to.

dnsSecurityRuleState.description: The state of DNS security rule.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the DNS security rule. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

etag.description: ETag of the DNS security rule.

properties.description: Properties of the DNS security rule.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

DnsSecurityRulePatchProperties.description: Represents the updatable properties of a DNS security rule.

action.description: The action to take on DNS requests that match the DNS security rule.

dnsResolverDomainLists.description: DNS resolver policy domains lists that the DNS security rule applies to.

dnsSecurityRuleState.description: The state of DNS security rule.

priority.description: The priority of the DNS security rule.

DnsSecurityRulePatch.description: Describes a DNS security rule for PATCH operation.

properties.description: Updatable properties of the DNS security rule.

DnsSecurityRuleListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on DNS security rules within a DNS resolver policy.

value.description: Enumeration of the DNS security rules.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

DnsSecurityRuleAction.description: The action to take on DNS requests that match the DNS security rule.

actionType.description: The type of action to take.

DnsResolverPolicyVirtualNetworkLinkPrope.description: Represents the properties of a DNS resolver policy virtual network link.

virtualNetwork.description: The reference to the virtual network. This cannot be changed after creation.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the DNS resolver policy virtual network link. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

DnsResolverPolicyVirtualNetworkLink.description: Describes a DNS resolver policy virtual network link.

etag.description: ETag of the DNS resolver policy virtual network link.

properties.description: Properties of the DNS resolver policy virtual network link.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

DnsResolverPolicyVirtualNetworkLinkPatch.description: Describes a DNS resolver policy virtual network link for PATCH operation.

tags.description: Tags for the DNS resolver policy virtual network link.

DnsResolverPolicyVirtualNetworkLinkListR.description: The response to an enumeration operation on DNS resolver policy virtual network links.

value.description: Enumeration of the DNS resolver policy virtual network links.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

DnsResolverDomainListProperties.description: Represents the properties of a DNS resolver domain list.

domains.description: The domains in the domain list. Will be null if user is using large domain list.

domainsUrl.description: The URL for bulk upload or download for domain lists containing larger set of domains. This will be populated if domains is empty or null.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the DNS resolver domain list. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

resourceGuid.description: The resourceGuid property of the DNS resolver domain list resource.

DnsResolverDomainList.description: Describes a DNS resolver domain list.

etag.description: ETag of the DNS resolver domain list.

properties.description: Properties of the DNS resolver domain list.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

DnsResolverDomainListPatchProperties.description: Represents the updatable properties of a DNS resolver domain list.

domains.description: The domains in the domain list.

DnsResolverDomainListPatch.description: Describes a DNS resolver domain list for PATCH operation.

properties.description: Updatable properties of the DNS resolver domain list.

tags.description: Tags for DNS resolver domain list.

DnsResolverDomainListListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on DNS resolver domain lists.

value.description: Enumeration of the DNS resolver domain lists.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

DnsResolverDomainListBulkProperties.description: Describes DNS resolver domain list properties for bulk UPLOAD or DOWNLOAD operations.

storageUrl.description: The storage account blob file URL to be used in the bulk upload or download request of DNS resolver domain list.

action.description: The action to take in the request, Upload or Download.

DnsResolverDomainListBulk.description: Describes a DNS resolver domain list for bulk UPLOAD or DOWNLOAD operations.

properties.description: Properties of the DNS resolver domain list upload or download request.

ProvisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the resource.

DnsResolverDomainListBulkActionType.description: The action type in requests for bulk upload or download of a DNS resolver domain list.

ResourceGuid.description: The Guid property of the resource.

SubResourceListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on sub-resources.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

DnsResolverPolicyNameParameter.name: dnsResolverPolicyName
DnsResolverPolicyNameParameter.description: The name of the DNS resolver policy.

DnsSecurityRuleNameParameter.name: dnsSecurityRuleName
DnsSecurityRuleNameParameter.description: The name of the DNS security rule.

DnsResolverPolicyVirtualNetworkLinkNameP.name: dnsResolverPolicyVirtualNetworkLinkName
DnsResolverPolicyVirtualNetworkLinkNameP.description: The name of the DNS resolver policy virtual network link for the DNS resolver policy.

DnsResolverDomainListNameParameter.name: dnsResolverDomainListName
DnsResolverDomainListNameParameter.description: The name of the DNS resolver domain list.

VirtualNetworkNameParameter.name: virtualNetworkName
VirtualNetworkNameParameter.description: The name of the virtual network.

TopParameter.name: $top
TopParameter.description: The maximum number of results to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 results.

IfMatchParameter.name: If-Match
IfMatchParameter.description: ETag of the resource. Omit this value to always overwrite the current resource. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting any concurrent changes.

IfNoneMatchParameter.name: If-None-Match
IfNoneMatchParameter.description: Set to '*' to allow a new resource to be created, but to prevent updating an existing resource. Other values will be ignored.
